comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
The attached patch integrates the latest 0.6-SNAPSHOT version of the RAT Maven plugin to the Jackrabbit build.
I'll wait until there's an official 0.6 release of RAT before committing this.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Automatic header checks are now enabled both in trunk and the 1.x branch.

description: To avoid problems with incorrect license headers, we should include some automated header check in the Maven build and have Hudson run the check whenever changes are committed.
summary: Automatic license header checking using the Apache Rat Plugin
